author: Eliza Relman
description: Rep. Jason Chaffetz, the House oversight committee chair, is expected to announce that he is leaving office before the end of his congressional term.
title: Jason Chaffetz announces early resignation from Congress

description: House Oversight Committee chair Jason Chaffetz sent a letter to acting FBI Director Andrew McCabe, asking for all FBI notes and information on James Comey's communications with President Trump
title: READ: Jason Chaffetz's letter to FBI

author: Jacob Pramuk
description: House Oversight Comittee Chairman Jason Chaffetz tweeted that his panel "is going to get the Comey memo, if it exists."
title: Jason Chaffetz asks FBI for reported Comey memos on Trump

author: Natalie Andrews
description: Utah Rep. Jason Chaffetz, the Republican leading the House committee responsible for conducting oversight and investigations of the White House, is planning to step down at the end of June, according to Republican aides and lawmakers familiar with his plans.
title: Jason Chaffetz to Announce Plans to Leave Congress by End of June

author: Eliza Collins
description: Rep. Jason Chaffetz, R-Utah, chairman of one of the key congressional committees investigating Russian interference in the 2016 election, said Thursday he will resign from Congress effective June 30.
title: Utah Rep. Jason Chaffetz to leave Congress in June, opening top investigative spot

author: Adam Shaw
description: Rep. Jason Chaffetz demanded that the FBI turn over all documents relating to communications between FBI Director Comey and President Trump.
title: Chaffetz Demands FBI Documents on Comey and Trump, Says He Has ‘Subpoena Pen Ready’

description: Rep. Jason Chaffetz, R-Utah, said Tuesday that despite all the controversies surrounding Donald Trump’s presidency, the House still has to “pass meaningful legislation and get it to the president’s deak.”
title: Trump's agenda at risk after series of controversies
